note: VALIDATED with one minor challenge (ch-1fa36d07541b7fc2): BG (2020) theorem/section numbers are systematically wrong (Thm 1 not 1.1; Thm 2 not 2.1; Sec 3 is 2D warmup not a priori estimates; Sec 4 is Three dimensions not Gamma-convergence). Mathematical content is correct. Core argument is sound: Boue-Dupuis correctly applied; adapted drift subtlety properly handled; dependency on 1.6.2.10.2.2.1 correctly used; generalization from V_eps to V_eps^{(alpha)} justified by unchanged stochastic estimates, preserved quartic coercivity, and quartic subordination of perturbation.
